channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Movie star and visionary Robert Redford has died at age 89
item.description: A movie star to his core, Robert Redford has died after a visionary career in cinema, including founding the Sundance Institute that transformed the m...

item.title: Has everyday life changed due to increased ICE activity in your area? We want to know
item.description: NPR wants to hear from listeners whose lives have changed due to an increase in ICE operations, throughout the country.

item.title: A U.N. inquiry accuses Israel of genocide in Gaza, joining a rising chorus
item.description: The report issued Tuesday by experts commissioned by the United Nations' Human Rights Council calls on the international community to end the genocide...

item.title: JD Vance vows to carry on Kirk's legacy. And, the Fed meets to decide interest rates.
item.description: Vice President Vance hosted Charlie Kirk's podcast yesterday and vowed to carry on his friend's political legacy. And, the Federal Reserve meets to de...

item.title: For first time in decades, U.S. says Colombia is falling short in drug war
item.description: For the first time in decades, the U.S. has decertified Colombia as a drug control partner — a symbolic blow to one of Washington's closest allies in ...

item.title: Kash Patel testifies at Senate hearing about FBI, Charlie Kirk assassination
item.description: FBI Director Kash Patel testified at a Senate hearing on Tuesday over his handling of the agency and the assassination of Charlie Kirk in Utah last we...

item.title: Luigi Mangione's state terrorism charges dismissed in UnitedHealthcare CEO killing, judge rules

item.title: Malawians await presidential poll result in vote dominated by economic woes
item.description: If no candidate wins more than half the votes, the top two contenders will head to a run-off.

item.title: Georgia Supreme Court declines to hear Fani Willis’ appeal of her removal from Trump election case
Suspect in Charlie Kirk shooting likely to face charges Tuesday before first court hearing
item.description: Prosecutors are looking at filing a capital murder charge against the Utah man jailed in the killing of conservative activist Charlie Kirk.

item.title: Watch: Bear caught on CCTV searching for food in Indian temple
item.description: The curious creature ransacked an office in its quest to find tasty treats.

item.title: US designates Colombia as country 'failing to cooperate in drug war'
item.description: For the first time in almost three decades Colombia loses its certification as a US ally in the war on drugs.

item.title: Acting legend Robert Redford dies aged 89
item.description: The acting star was famous for roles in The Sting and Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid.

item.title: What is at stake in Malawi's elections as cost-of-living bites?
item.description: Campaigns were overshadowed by price rises and fuel shortages.

item.title: Trump administration joins Republicans’ campaign to police speech in reaction to Kirk’s killing
